House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00300
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTIONS 4 AND 8 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7042, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'FOREIGN INVESTMENT ACT OF 1991'
SHORT TITLE : Further Promoting The Entry Of Foreign Direct Investments In The Country By Amending Sections 4 And 8 Of Republic Act No. 7042, As Amended, Otherwise Known As The "foreign Investments Act Of 1991"
ABSTRACT : Aims to exclude the “practice of professions” from the coverage of the Foreign Investments Act (FIA) so as to attract foreign professionals to practice in the Philippines wherein they would be able to bring in technology and know-how from abroad and attract foreign direct investments, and help generate more employment opportunities in the country.
